BodyName: Subcommittee on Planning, Dispositions and Concessions

Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. C 050072 HAM, an Urban Development Action Area Designation and Project, located at 435-439 East 119th Street, and the disposition of such property, Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 8.  This matter is subject to Council Review and action pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter and Article 16 of the General Municipal Law.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. C 050073 ZSM, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the Charter of the City of New York concerning a special permit under Section 74-902 of the Zoning Resolution in the Borough of Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 8 to facilitate the development of an adult residential facility. This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

This matter is subject to Council review and action pursuant to Article 16 of the New York General Municipal Law, at the request of the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development and pursuant to Section 696 of the General Municipal Law for an exemption from real property taxes.
